commands.name: az hdinsight-on-aks clusterpool upgrade history
commands.summary: List a list of upgrade history.

commands.name: az hdinsight-on-aks clusterpool upgrade list
commands.summary: List a cluster pool available upgrade.

commands.name: az hdinsight-on-aks clusterpool upgrade run
commands.syntax:
az hdinsight-on-aks clusterpool upgrade run [--cluster-pool-name]
                                            [--ids]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--node-os-upgrade]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--subscription]
                                            [--upgrade-profile]
examples: az hdinsight-on-aks clusterpool upgrade run --cluster-pool-name {poolName} -g {RG} --upgrade-profile {target-aks-version=1.27.9 upgrade-clusters=false upgrade-cluster-pool=true}
